mapper.select: SELECT ac.* FROM sys_approval_chain ac WHERE ac.id = #{refApprovalChainId}
mapper.update: update sys_approval_chain set all_finished = true where id = #{approvalChainId};
mapper.select: select an.* from SYS_RULE_APPROVAL_NODE an where exists ( select 1 from SYS_APPROVAL_CHAIN c, SYS_RULE_APPROVAL_NODE n where c.RULE_APPROVAL_NODE_OID = n.RULE_APPROVAL_NODE_OID and n.RULE_APPROVAL_CHAIN_OID=an.RULE_APPROVAL_CHAIN_OID and an.SEQUENCE_NUMBER <= n.SEQUENCE_NUMBER and c.ENTITY_TYPE = #{entityType} and c.ENTITY_OID = #{entityOid} ) order by SEQUENCE_NUMBER
